title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in win32 has a line of code that uses Class.forName() to create a new Callback object.
EB: The BidiUtil class in win32 should use a different method instead of Class.forName() to create the Callback object.
SR: To reproduce the issue, verify or use jxeLink or something similar. The compiler will generate the call itself and assume that the NoClassDefFoundError is available. The simplest way to fix this is to remove the reflection and find an alternative method to create the Callback object.
